text: Ngconde Balfour (born 23 August 1954) was a South African politician. He was Minister of Correctional Services and Minister of Sport in 2004. He was also the high commissioner to Botswana."Confusion rattles markets", Sapa (IOL), 23 September 2008. ==References== Category:South African politicians Category:Living people Category:1954 births
title: Ngconde Balfour
